The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 13 July is 48,465 (5,609.5 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 08 July, there were 2,188 new confirmed cases (253.2 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 01 July, there were 1,340 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 63% (848 extra cases).
